meanings.sent1: The reiteration of the teacher's instructions helped the students understand better.
meanings.sent2: Her constant reiteration of the safety rules ensured everyone followed them.
meanings.sent3: The reiteration of the joke made everyone laugh even harder.
meanings.sent4: The reiteration of the melody in the song created a sense of familiarity.
meanings.sent5: The reiteration of the key points made the presentation more memorable.

meanings.definition: The repeated utterance of a statement.
meanings.sent1: The politician's reiteration of his promise gained him more supporters.
meanings.sent2: The constant reiteration of the slogan made it stick in people's minds.
meanings.sent3: The reiteration of the excuse sounded less convincing each time.
meanings.sent4: The reiteration of the warning echoed through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: The reiteration of the question made it clear that an answer was needed.
